item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: New Zealand, Christchurch, Canterbury, Australasia, Crime, National
item.title: Cold case murder: Angela Blackmoore killer sentenced to life in prison
item.description:
An amateur contract killer who bludgeoned and stabbed a young Christchurch mum to death 25 years ago in a "dreadful and monstrous killing" has today been jailed for at least 10 years.
Jeremy Powell ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/angelablackmoorepic_70x71.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Angela Blackmoore was 21 when she died at her home in August 1995. Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/JeremyPowell_70x71.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Jeremy Powell admitted the brutal murder of Christchurch woman Angela Blackmoore back in 1995. Photo / Supplied

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/laurieholdingphotopic_70x71.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Laurie Anderson holds a photo of him with partner Angela Blackmoore who was murdered in 1995 just a week after the photo was taken. Photo / Kurt Bayer

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/angelablackmoore2_70x71.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Angela Blackmoore, pictured here with her partner Laurie Anderson, was murdered in 1995 just a week after the photo was taken. Photo / NZ Herald

item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Whakatane, Tauranga, Bay of Plenty, Rotorua Daily Post, Bay of Plenty Times, RDP - Whakatane regional news, National, White Island
item.title: 'Very angry': White Island survivor lashes out at authorities over rescue delays
item.description:
A survivor of the Whakaari/White Island eruption, who lost her sister and father, says more people would have survived if help came sooner.
Australian woman Stephanie Browitt, 23, suffered burns to 70 ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/SCCZEN_A_180220SPLBROWITT2_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Stephanie Browitt's father Paul and sister Krystal died as a result of the eruption. Photo / Facebook

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/SCCZEN_A_121219SPLWHITE5_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=White Island shortly after the eruption on December 9. Photo / White Island Flights

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/SCCZEN_A_091219SPLWHITE12_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The volcano erupted on the afternoon of December 9, 2019. Photo / Allessandro Kauffman

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202024/SCCZEN_A_091219SPLTOURISTS4_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Tourists are cleared from White Island following the eruption. Photo / Michael Schade
